title: CLASSIFICATION Down the hands of the races and the fighters! The persecutions and terrorism will not pass!
content:
All on Thursday 21 March, 6:30 pm
In concentration
At PIRAEUS MUNICIPAL THEATER

They persecute the struggles. Target class unionism. They make illegal the strikes. They drown in the demonstrations. Capture students. They dismiss strikers. Set up categories and trials against those who are struggling, claim and demonstrate to defend the rights of a people suffering From the expansion of modern barbarism. Make the penalties even more heavier that can impose their judges. Re -activate the law Chrysochoid against demonstrations.

They want to impose a generalized regime of horror and repression. They want to do Quietly the dirty assigned to them by local capitalism and the Their imperialist bosses. Want workers, people and youth With heads bent over, to accept the daily looting of everyday in their lives and rights.

The persecuted ELME teachers of Piraeus , the fired employee of the EKPA , the prosecution against president of PENEN and against President of the Piraeus Labor Center , but also The 49 student arrests in Thessaloniki It is not accidental at all. Are aspects of fascism that impose The forces of the system in political and public life. Is part of her deeply class, reactionary policy promoted by the new government Democracy with the support of the rest of the bourgeoisie.

They are movements of purely political character. Are aimed at terrorism, the silencing of any voice of resistance and the consolidation of the new type 'State' employee who will be subjugated and, with his head bowed, will faithfully applies the dictates of the bourgeois state. They use all the reactive legal arsenal voted by system governments to criminalize trade union action, participation in mobilization, expression of the opposite view. Baptize 'inappropriate behavior' the racing and militant attitude. They want the trade union "in plaster", the unions to engage in virtual 'struggles' and trade unionists to' hold Balances "and accuse the world of" not pulling ".

These persecutions are part coordinated Trying to terrorize all workers and all the people. It is a continuation of an industry of trade union and political persecution the recent years. Is a continuation of the persecutions pending at the expense of demonstrators of 17 o November and 6 o December 2020. It is a continuation of the fines for posters. They want to get the rematch against the popular and labor movement that comes out, increasingly Often, by hundreds of thousands on the road to the race. Across the student Movement that had been written off but gave great examples of struggle again.

They will not stop here if we do not respond massively and dynamically . Because in front of black future which the system specifies for workers, the intensity of attack, poverty, repression, terrorism and war, the The answer was and is the massive, decisive struggle.

The forces of the system count without us. We won't make them the favour. We are not willing to live in fear. I will not We allow. We will not accept the silence of cemetery they want to impose. I will We continue to fight for our political and democratic rights. For Democratic and trade union freedoms. We call every employee, every Young, every democratic and progressive man in common and coordinated Action to prevent the persecutions and the climate of terrorism passes. To We defend, collectively and organized those who are prosecuted, but also the right To live and fight.

  • Down the hands of the Associations, clubs and fighters!
  • To stop all now The persecutions!
  • To cancel the dismissal of EKPA employee, Dimitris Antoniou!
  • Terrorism will not pass!
CLASS
author: Κ.Μπ.
